articles.description: Williamson County has reported another death from COVID-19. A man in his 40s died from coronavirus, the county said Sunday. A previously reported death on Friday of a male in his 70s could not be confirmed a COVID-19 positive death, so the death toll remains …

articles.title: A man says he lost his father to coronavirus and 28 family members got infected - WCVB Boston
articles.description: His 60-year-old father died a day before Father's Day.
articles.content:
Southern California resident Richard Garay tested positive for coronavirus in early June, around the same time his father also got sick, he said.
About two weeks later, his father, Vidal Garay, died… [+2671 chars]

articles.title: ‘There’s a cocktail out there that can cure this’: Inside a UCSF-led quest to exploit the coronavirus’ weak spots - San Francisco Chronicle

articles.content:
